channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
[s]One day (today) I decide to go on a private server and I come to see that after the silabsoft client window says "Unpacking Config", it goes to a different screen with a black background saying[/s]
[s][size=13pt][b]Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape[/b][/size] [size=10pt][b]To fix this try the following (in order):[/b][/size] [size=7pt][b]1. Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading[/b][/size] [size=7pt][b]2. Try clearing your web-browsers cashe from tools->internet options[/b][/size] [size=7pt][b]3. Try using a different game-world[/b][/size] [size=7pt][b]4. Try rebooting your computer[/b][/size] [size=7pt][b]5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu[/b][/size][/s]
[s]I have tried all of that and have read every help topic and it still gives me that error. I have tried everything, please help me ASAP.[/s] Nevermind, my friend helped me on AIM.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @sasquiotch sasquiotch
item.description:
@sasquiotch wrote:

load the webclient … then your downloaded client should work

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @cs475x cs475x
item.description:
@cs475x wrote:

One day (today) I decide to go on a private server and I come to see that after the silabsoft client window says “Unpacking Config”, it goes to a different screen with a black background saying

[s][size=13pt][b]Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape[/b][/size]

[size=10pt]To fix this try the following (in order):[/size]

[size=7pt]1. Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading[/size]

[size=7pt]2. Try clearing your web-browsers cashe from tools->internet options[/size]

[size=7pt]3. Try using a different game-world[/size]

[size=7pt]4. Try rebooting your computer[/size]

[size=7pt]5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu[/size][/s]

I have tried all of that and have read every help topic and it still gives me that error. I have tried everything, please help me ASAP.

Nevermind, my friend helped me on AIM.

Read full topic
